name: L'Hotel Dualité
description:
The game is a narrative driven exploration of two characters in different timelines, represented by a visual split screen, and controlling two separate characters at the same time. As you explore a hotel, you will uncover a murder mystery set in a Victorian inspired setting. WASD and arrow keys to move, E and enter to interact for each character you control. 

 Made by The Lonely Mountaineers team during GGJ 2022 in 48 hours 

 Art: 
Nina Taylor https://globalgamejam.org/users/ntaylo209
